movies.original_title: ตี๋ใหญ่ ฤกษ์ดาวโจร
movies.overview: In 1980s Bangkok, a wily thief stages a series of daring heists, baffling the authorities and the public — until one cop sets out to take him down.
movies.tagline: Meet the "King of Thieves", whose life is coming to an end.
movies.title: Tee Yai: Born to Be Bad

movies.original_title: หมู่บ้านโคกะโหลก
movies.overview: A wave of chilling serial murders emerges, marked by the gruesome decay of male victims' secret part. As the police investigate, they confront eerie local myths and dark secrets.
movies.tagline: The legend awakens. terrifying. ridiculous. unstoppable.
movies.title: Ko Ga Loak Village

movies.overview: Drama about a mother and her 4 children.
movies.title: The Mother

movies.original_title: เพราะเราคู่กัน THE MOVIE
movies.overview: To avoid unwanted attention, a college student asks the most popular guy on campus to pretend to date him — but their fake feelings become real love.
movies.title: 2gether: The Movie

movies.original_title: วิญญาณเลขที่ 13
movies.overview: Bussaba, a volleyball player who enjoyed bullying others, was found dead by hanging in a gym, causing chaos and horror among other team members.
movies.tagline: Attack me, attack back! play fair!
movies.title: Attack 13

movies.overview: A romance against huge generation gap between a barely pensioned policeman Daeng and a senior high school girl. The thirty-year gap makes their relationship difficult but they will try to prove their true love together.
movies.tagline: Age does not matter in true love.
movies.title: Love 101

movies.overview: M, a university dropout low on money and luck, volunteers to take care of his terminally ill grandmother, in the hope of pocketing an inheritance.
movies.tagline: Never underestimate a grandma's love for her family.
movies.title: How to Make Millions Before Grandma Dies

movies.overview: Die Tomorrow entails six short segments about the impermanence of life, all inspired by deaths reported in Thai daily newspapers.
movies.title: Die Tomorrow

movies.overview: A mother surprises her son with a birthday treat – an ultra-dark and bittersweet chocolate cake. Its mysterious taste makes strange things happen.
movies.title: Bittersweet Chocolate

movies.overview: Ing is sent to Pinijkhun Reform School, an all-girls facility on a remote island. The only rule here is that everyone must obey orders.
movies.title: Host

movies.overview: Manit witnessed the murder of his parents when he was just 10 years old. The killers shot him in the head, but he miraculously survived. However, the damage to his brain left him unable to experience regular human emotions. A martial arts master saved him and took him in. Twenty years later, Manit has become a master of martial arts himself. He returns to the scene of the crime, seeking justice.
movies.title: Bangkok Revenge

movies.overview: A documentary about a Thai idol girl group, BNK48 originally adapting from a Japanese idol girl group, AKB48 open opportunity to ordinary teens to be selected into a controlled system and competitive concept.
movies.title: BNK48: Girls Don't Cry

movies.original_title: อนงค์ 2..สามสี่ชาติ
movies.overview: Witness the deep bond between Joe and Anong, which has been long-lasting through many lifetimes and reincarnations.
movies.title: My Boo 2

movies.overview: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.
movies.tagline: No computer graphics. No stunt doubles. No wires.
movies.title: Ong-Bak

movies.original_title: เขาชุมทอง คะนองชุมโจร
movies.overview: At the tail end of World War II, a bandit leader and his crew go up against his sworn enemy and the Japanese army to rob a train full of gold.
movies.title: Gold Rush Gang

movies.overview: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.
movies.title: The Protector

movies.overview: Working in HR at a challenging company, Fren interviews young new hires and is secretly one month pregnant, grappling with the decision to have a child in difficult circumstances.
movies.title: Human Resource

movies.overview: Tien, the son of Lord Sihadecho — a murdered nobleman — is taken under the wing of Chernang, a renowned warrior and leader of the Pha Beek Krut.
movies.title: Ong Bak 2

movies.original_title: 404 สุขีนิรันดร์..Run Run
movies.overview: Nakrob, a young real estate swindler, discovers an abandoned hillside hotel by the beach. Seeing an opportunity, he decides to turn it into a luxury hotel scam.
movies.tagline: This hotel is run by a ghost who enjoys making people run away!
movies.title: 404 Run Run

movies.original_title: ปากกัด ตีนถีบ
movies.overview: In a fight for survival against a horrifying army of zombies, a former Muay Thai fighter must use skill, speed and grit to save his girlfriend.
movies.tagline: This barehanded fighter will knock down a horde of zombies.
movies.title: Ziam

tv_shows.name: Dhevaprom
tv_shows.original_name: ดวงใจเทวพรหม
tv_shows.overview: Dhevaprom is a Thai lakorn based on the novel of the same name and written by the same writers as its preceding story ... The Five Brothers series, that aired in 2013. Dhevaprom consists of Laorchan, Kwanruetai, Jaiphisut, Dujapsorn and Porncheewan.

seasons.name: Dhevaprom Laorchan
seasons.overview:
Laorchan, who grew up in France and was reared by the elite, returns to Thailand to prove her family’s innocence and learn the truth about her origins. Laorchan plans to steal an ancient, accursed gemstone—the Ajna Chakra necklace—exhibiting at an aristocratic department store owned by M.L. Phuthanet Juthathep, son of M.R. Ratchanon and Soifah.

She befriends the suave Phuthanet and he is instantly taken by her charm, beauty, and mysterious persona. Complications arise when she starts to fall for him, as deception and love are things that don’t go together. Can she resist his charms and accomplish her objective?

seasons.name: Dhevaprom Kwanruetai
seasons.overview: A doctor from a noble family and a girl with an unrevealed past - will they ever fall in love amidst a fight against drug trafficking? Kind, generous and hardworking Kwanruetai is the daughter of M.L Maratee Dhevaprom, whose whole being is in earnest for her mother’s love and approval. She meets young military doctor - Major Dr. M.L Chatklao Jutathep, while on duty in the northern province of Thailand, where they are caught in the throes of danger due to gangs and drug wars. Chatklao falls in love with Kwanruetai but she is conflicted given their families’ long-standing estrangement. Her mother is dead-set against Kwanruetai’s romance with Chatklao as his father - M.R. Phudhipat, had humiliated her when he broke off their betrothal, for another woman. Will Kwanruetai listen to her heart; or are the Jutatheps and Dhevaproms, just not meant to be together?

seasons.name: Dhevaprom Jaipisut
seasons.overview: Capt. Ronnajak Jutathep, eldest son of M.R. Ronnaphee, is entrusted with his deceased friend’s younger sister, Sunida. When he enrols Sunida at his alma mater, he runs into a former classmate, Jaipisut, who is now a teacher. Jaipisut barely tolerates Ronnajak, as she has no good childhood memories of him because of his teasing; but the two are forced to play nice together when Sunida has problems at school. Building a friendship with your arch-nemesis is never easy. Theirs is far more complicated when Jaipisut finds out she is adopted, and from the heirloom brooch left by her birth mother, she might be a Dhevaprom. Will Jaipisut’s connection to the Dhevaprom prove too much for Ronnajak to overcome, or will the two realise that what they have is worth fighting for?

seasons.name: Dhevaprom Dujupsorn
seasons.overview: "Fah" Dujupsorn’s mother M.L. Wilairampha remains resentful of M.R. Ronnaphi Juthathep for breaking a promise to marry her. Fah loves her mother so much that she is ready to take revenge on the Juthatheps; she is to apply for a job at a Juthathep-owned company and seduce M.L. Ronnaphum Juthathep to fall for her, only to hurt him. Ironically, it is Fah who falls in love; she is stunned when she meets the president of the company, Major M.L. Asira Juthathep, the eldest son of M.R. Tharathorn, as he is the charming and handsome soldier from her past who had once saved her life. She now faces the toughest decision of her life: revenge may not be her choice, but it is her destiny.

seasons.name: Dhevaprom Poncheewan
seasons.overview: Cheewan gets the order to be a matchmaker for Saruj—the secretary of the Thai ambassador in Rome, Italy—and Porncheewa, the perfect student who is studying there. Her mission isn't easy as Khun Saruj is cold and Cheewa is arrogant. Cheewan plots a sweet trip for them to Italy. However, Khun Saruj started falling for Cheewan instead of Phorncheewa.

tv_shows.name: Dangerous Queen
tv_shows.original_name: คนโปรดของควีน
tv_shows.overview:
Bonita spends her time supporting her mother who suffers from alcohol and gambling addiction. In addition to this, her neighbour "Kem" pursues her relentlessly even though she only sees him as a friend.

Her life takes a surprising turn when she goes to a bar and meets "Queen", a high-society woman from a prominent family. Queen helps Bonita escape her mother's abuse and they face various challenges before they become each other's favourite.

"In my life, I have only one favourite person."

last_episode_to_air.name: Your Sky of Us 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: As graduation nears, Moonfa travels between Hong Kong and Thailand to assist his father. Meanwhile, Teerak secretly prepares a handmade gift to celebrate Moonfa’s achievement, while Moonfa plans an extravagant surprise for their anniversary.

tv_shows.name: Your Sky
tv_shows.original_name: กี่หมื่นฟ้า
tv_shows.overview: Due to an unforeseen situation, a naive freshman and the campus’s popular senior agree to pretend to be a couple — but their fake deal begins to affect their real feelings.

seasons.name: Your Sky
seasons.overview:
Teerak, an adorable fresher nicknamed “Saggy Cheeks,” is being pursued by a senior who keeps asking to be his boyfriend. He tries to find a way to avoid him until he meets Muenfah, a scary-looking guy who has to pretend to be his temporary boyfriend due to an unforeseen situation. Now, how will they make this believable?

With such opposite differences, will the horizon and the edge of the sea ever meet...?

seasons.name: Your Sky of Us
seasons.overview: After a year and eight months together Teerak and Muenfah face some obstacles in their relationship.

tv_shows.tagline: When fate brings two souls closer.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Thup senses a strange closeness between Sing and King as new evidence leads the team toward the ominous Santi Tham.

seasons.name: Season 1
